params._hypernode: The address of the hypernode to add

params._feeRouter: The address that receives withdrawn fees

params._takerFeeBips: The taker fee in basis points

cancelOwnershipHandover().details: Cancels the two-step ownership handover to the caller, if any.

completeOwnershipHandover(address).details: Allows the owner to complete the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`. Reverts if there is no existing ownership handover requested by `pendingOwner`.

returns._0: The height of the highest block verified by the light client.

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

ownershipHandoverExpiresAt(address).details: Returns the expiry timestamp for the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`.

params._hypernode: The address of the hypernode to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the owner to renounce their ownership.

requestOwnershipHandover().details: Request a two-step ownership handover to the caller. The request will automatically expire in 48 hours (172800 seconds) by default.

params.settleOrderParams: An array of order and payment pairs to settle

params.blockProofParams: The parameters necessary to update the onchain light client
params.paymentParams: An array of seperate payments being submitted
params.proof: The zero knowledge proof of the payments and light client update

params.paymentParams: An array of seperate payments being submitted
params.proof: The zero knowledge proof of the payments

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`.

params.blockProofParams: The parameters necessary to update the onchain light client
params.proof: The zero knowledge proof of the light client update

params.peaks: The peak nodes of the block leaf in the MMR.
params.siblings: The sibling nodes of the block leaf in the MMR.

addHypernode(address).notice: Adds a hypernode to the exchange

checkpoints(bytes32).notice: Retrieves checkpoint information for a given MMR root.

feeRouter().notice: The address that receives withdrawn fees

getTotalOrders().notice: Returns the total number of orders

getTotalPayments().notice: Returns the total number of payments

lightClientHeight().notice: Returns the block height of the current tip of the verified chain.

mmrRoot().notice: The MMR root that includes all the blocks the light client is currently attesting as the best chain.

refundOrder((uint256,uint64,uint64,uint2.notice: Refunds an order if not filled during the lockup period

removeHypernode(address).notice: Removes a hypernode from the exchange

settleOrders(((uint256,uint64,uint64,uin.notice: Verifies that a payment is still in the longest chain after a challenge period and releases funds

submitPaymentProofs((bytes32,(uint256,ui.notice: Verifies payment proofs and starts the challenge period for the payments, additionally updates the light client

submitPaymentProofsOnly((bytes32,(uint25.notice: Verifies payment proofs and starts the challenge period for the payments

takerFeeBips().notice: The taker fee in basis points

tokenizedBitcoin().notice: The address of the tokenized Bitcoin token

verifier().notice: The zero knowledge proof verifier contract

verifyBlockInclusion((bytes32,uint32,uin.notice: Verifies that a block is included in the verified chain (MMR).
